## IBlend.blend() method

Uses given `op` function to blend / compose pixels of this buffer with those of `dest` and writes results into `dest`<!-- -->. Supports same options as `blit()`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
blend(op: F, dest: IPixelBuffer<T, P>, opts?: Partial<BlitOpts>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  op | <code>F</code> |  |
|  dest | <code>IPixelBuffer&lt;T, P&gt;</code> |  |
|  opts | <code>Partial&lt;BlitOpts&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
